result.title: Hokkaido Univ.& Hitachi 2nd New-concept Computing Contest 2017
result.content:
Hello again!

After a very successful first round with outstanding submissions far beyond our expectation, it is our pleasure to announce that the second Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi New-concept Computing Contest 2017 will start soon:

2nd Contest: from November 29th to December 12th, 2017

Similar to the first round, the second contest is a two-week, marathon-type programming contest, jointly sponsored by Hokkaido University and Hitachi, Ltd. The contest provides a problem related to a graph conversion algorithm, which is regarded as the key technology of the new computing concept. The winner of the contest will be awarded a prize of 300,000 Japanese Yen. If you are curious, we welcome you to sign up for the contest through the following website:

  • Hokkaido Univ. & Hitachi 2nd New-concept Computing Contest 2017

We emphasize that registration for the second contest is open to everyone! In particular, participation in the second contest does not require prior participation in the first round.

We look forward to your participation!
